robotsTxt:
#
# robots.txt
#
# This file is to prevent the crawling and indexing of certain parts
# of your site by web crawlers and spiders run by sites like Yahoo!
# and Google. By telling these "robots" where not to go on your site,
# you save bandwidth and server resources.
#
# This file will be ignored unless it is at the root of your host:
# Used:    http://example.com/robots.txt
# Ignored: http://example.com/site/robots.txt
#
# For more information about the robots.txt standard, see:
# http://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html

User-agent: *
# CSS, JS, Images
Allow: /core/*.css$
Allow: /core/*.css?
Allow: /core/*.js$
Allow: /core/*.js?
Allow: /core/*.gif
Allow: /core/*.jpg
Allow: /core/*.jpeg
Allow: /core/*.png
Allow: /core/*.svg
Allow: /profiles/*.css$
Allow: /profiles/*.css?
Allow: /profiles/*.js$
Allow: /profiles/*.js?
Allow: /profiles/*.gif
Allow: /profiles/*.jpg
Allow: /profiles/*.jpeg
Allow: /profiles/*.png
Allow: /profiles/*.svg
# Directories
Disallow: /core/
Disallow: /profiles/
# Files
Disallow: /README.txt
Disallow: /web.config
# Paths (clean URLs)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /comment/reply/
Disallow: /filter/tips
Disallow: /node/add/
Disallow: /user/register
Disallow: /user/password
Disallow: /user/login
Disallow: /user/logout
# Paths (no clean URLs)
Disallow: /index.php/admin/
Disallow: /index.php/comment/reply/
Disallow: /index.php/filter/tips
Disallow: /index.php/node/add/
Disallow: /index.php/search/
Disallow: /index.php/user/password
Disallow: /index.php/user/register
Disallow: /index.php/user/login
Disallow: /index.php/user/logout
# wissen.de
# URL parameters
Disallow: /?*
Disallow: /*?page=*
Disallow: /*?keyword=*
Disallow: /*?nl
Disallow: /wissenstest/*?*
Disallow: /podcast/*?*
Disallow: /bilder/*?*
Disallow: /service/*?*
Disallow: /thema/*?*
Disallow: /video/*?*
Disallow: /uebersetzung/*?*
Disallow: /fest-feiertage/*?*
Disallow: /redewendung/*?*
Disallow: /fragen/*?*
Disallow: /zitate/*?*
Disallow: /fremdwoerter/*?*
Disallow: /raetsel/*?*

# Block only URLs under these specific paths when they include ?chunk= or ?cache=
Disallow: /medizin/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /medizin/*?cache=*
Disallow: /synonym/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /synonym/*?cache=*
Disallow: /ddwg/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /ddwg/*?cache=*
Disallow: /wortherkunft/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /wortherkunft/*?cache=*
Disallow: /fremdwort/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /fremdwort/*?cache=*
Disallow: /vorname/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /vorname/*?cache=*
Disallow: /rechtschreibung/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /rechtschreibung/*?cache=*
Disallow: /bildwb/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /bildwb/*?cache=*
Disallow: /kalendar/*?chunk=*
Disallow: /kalendar/*?cache=*
Disallow: /lexikon/*?cache=*

# Search
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /search/
# geboren am
Disallow: /geburtstage
Disallow: /geburtstage/
# was geschah am
Disallow: /was_geschah_am
Disallow: /was_geschah_am/*
# print
Disallow: /print
Disallow: /print/
